Articles.Content: I need the old demo for reasons. Anyone have the old demo? I know there was one post with old versions, but It apparently had viruses.

The old versions in that thread didn't have viruses so don't worry, it was the patcher being erroneously flagged as a potential virus as it was an .exe that could download files from the net.

I can't find the old thread, do you have a link?

The old versions in that thread didn't have viruses so don't worry, it was the patcher being erroneously flagged as a potential virus as it was an .exe that could download files from the net.

I can't find the old thread, do you have a link?

This one ?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted!%29

People here say the virus come from the file host service, it sounds strange to me.
